quote.msg: 香港讀學術英文, 去到UK 係未冇咩chance 有工做, 要轉行???? 人地個個英文係native speaker, proficiency 又好過我. 只係英文講到小小, 去到有咩撈多??

肯搵一定有嘅，英國唔多人讀大學
btw想知點解讀學術英文但係只係講到小小英文

我只係Academic English 講到... e.g. 以前大學去外地conference presentation
你話咩生活英語, slang, joke, humor, literature, 我乜撚都唔識...

replies.msg:
Frankly speaking, all you have to do is to live in an English speaking environment for 6 months. Hence, British won't expect you can speak as fluent as they were, same we do not expect them can speak fluent Cantonese.
Communication is a two way thing.
